product_name: Sierra Designs Internal Guy Kit - Package of 4 - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Internal guylines reinforce backcountry dwellings via crisscrossing support lines that increase your tent's structural integrity and defend it against harsh winds and weather at exposed campsites.
short_description: Internal guylines reinforce backcountry dwellings via crisscrossing support lines that increase your tent's structural integrity and defend it against harsh winds and weather at exposed campsites.
